page.title: 06HEATON PARK-OLD BUILDINGS
page.content:
{Heaton Hall}is a grade 2 listed building,built in 1745.The staircase is cantilevered.The only other such staircase in Britain,is in Tatton Hall It was the first building in Britain to have metal roof spars.
{The Collonade-}In 1911,the front of the old Town Hall in King St. Manchester,was taken down brick by brick and was rebuilt in the Park.
{Telecommunications Tower-}The tower is 78.3m high and 25 years old.Itis owned by British Telecom and used for Telephone and Television communication
{The Temple}- The temple was built in 1722 by James Wyatt.It was simply ornamental.
